Package org.apache.bookkeeper.replication

Class ReplicationWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.bookkeeper.replication.ReplicationWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    @StatsDoc(name="replication_worker",
          help="replication worker related stats")
public class ReplicationWorker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    ReplicationWorker will take the fragments one by one from ZKLedgerUnderreplicationManager and replicates to it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReplicationWorker

        public ReplicationWorker​(ServerConfiguration conf)
                  throws ReplicationException.CompatibilityException,
                         ReplicationException.UnavailableException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Replication worker for replicating the ledger fragments from UnderReplicationManager to the targetBookie. This target bookie will be a local bookie.
        Parameters:
        conf - - configurations
        Throws:
        ReplicationException.CompatibilityException
        ReplicationException.UnavailableException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
